Articles.Content:
Sup, I'm UnstableOrbit. I am a new user who just bought KSP two days ago after painstakingly building my very first gaming computer. I am a noob, but I do know some of the basics from watching streamers like Plexistan, Das, and from youtubers such as Scott Manley. I have managed to build one successful rocket and one successful spaceplane so far, and I can provide pictures to anyone interested.

Anyways, I plan to open up my own KSP livestream, as well as make mods for the game. One mod I hope to start soon will add classic muscle car bodypanels, as well as automotive components. The idea is to be able to build rovers with a bit of style and speed(because seriously, who doesn't want to ramp a GTO off the lip of a crater?). I will need help with coding though, or at least a mentor, so yeah. That's all for now!
